concept.title: Trending Integration
concept.shortdesc: Showcase the most active Collections on your Site or Network.

conbody.p: Use Trending to showcase the Collections with the most recent activity in your Site or Network.

section.title: Integration
section.p: The quickest way to integrate with Trending is to use the built version hosted on Livefyreâ€™s CDN.
First, add Livefyre.js to your page.
Then, position the element in which the App will appear.
Finally, use Livefyre.require to construct the component.
section.codeblock:
<script>
Livefyre.require([
   'streamhub-hot-collections#0'
], function(Trending) {    
   var app = new Trending({
      el: document.getElementById("trending"),
      network: 'livefyre.com'
   });
   app.start();
});
</script>
section.p: You now have a Trending App! See this all in action in this example.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: The Network from which Collections will be pulled. (Required.)
Provide the Site ID to show Collections only from a single Site within your Network. (Optional.)
Provide a single Collection tag to show only Collections with that tag. (Optional.)
